alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Jones; Monroe; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 8:47PM EST until January 05 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Jones, Houston, Bibb, Monroe and Twiggs Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Macon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Macon. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins along the river upstream and downstream from the gage at U.S. Highway 80 or Martin Luther King Boulevard. Portions of the Ocmulgee Riverwalk and agricultural lands well downstream will be under a foot of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 PM EST Tuesday was 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 12.5 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.4 feet on 10/13/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
